Question: Jiangmen Hengji Crafts Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jiangmen Hengji Crafts Technology Co., Ltd.

Promotion Products

- Specializes in mouse pads, coasters, fridge magnets, and more
- Strict quality control and compliance with CE&SGS test
- Offers roll material of natural rubber foam, high-class mouse pads, fridge magnets, coasters, key chains, wooden toys, and more
- Products are natural, environmentally friendly, and harmless to human body and environment
- Accepts customers' designs, logos, and OEM orders
- Ideal for promotional tools to guide customers to websites or company information
Summary_cn:
江门恒基工艺科技有限公司。

促销产品

- 专业生产鼠标垫，杯垫，冰箱磁铁等产品
- 严格质量控制，并符合CE和SGS测试要求
- 提供天然橡胶泡沫卷料，高级鼠标垫，冰箱磁铁，杯垫，钥匙链，木制玩具等
- 产品天然环保，对人体和环境无害
- 接受客户的设计，logo和OEM订单
- 是引导客户进入网站或了解公司信息的理想推广工具
